summary:
They say that the head of a patent office in the late 19th century believed that everything had already been invented and wanted to shut down the operation.  The story is a persistent myth, but that's pretty much how I feel right now. 
It feels like I have nothing new to write...
title: Nothing New to Write

summary:
I like short sentences. 

I’m sure other people do too.  Perhaps this is what made Ernest Hemingway such a successful writer...
title: Short sentences

summary: Minor first world problems abound here at Chez Alex this morning.  As the master drain that services both our laundry and kitchen sink has started backing up.  So that, ever time someone in a floor above us uses their dishwasher, sink, or washing machine, water and soap suds is coming up through our kitchen sink...
title: Flood Alert!

summary:
